items.sentence: It took him a moment to realize where he was after he came to.
I don\'t know what you\'re cooking, but it smells really good.
Tom and Mary haven\'t decided on a date for their wedding yet.
Tom and Mary said that they\'d come, but they never showed up.
Tom can\'t be over thirty. He looks like he\'s about eighteen.
What\'s a beautiful woman like you doing in a place like this?
I can get Christmas Day off, but I have work on Christmas Eve.
Tom and Mary told me that they had a good time at the concert.
I can\'t believe that you were the smartest kid in your class.
Tom neatly folded the letter and slipped it into the envelope.
